ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually we can use thrown weapons.  And to a degree, once you have a sufficient enough throwing skill, this could be the factor that tips the scales in
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Dan Bouchard" <dbouch@...>
>
>Quick note in case some of you don't know:
>
> The Dragoon Dirk can be equipped in your ranged weapon slot. This is
>good if you don't use Piercing but still want to reap the magical benefits
>of the Dirk. We can't use ranged weapons, so we might as well make some use
>of that slot.
>
Actually we can use thrown weapons. And to a degree, once you have a
sufficient enough throwing skill, this could be the factor that tips the
scales in favor of coming out of melee, wielding an instrument & playing
your songs instead of staying in the fight & singing. You can still throw
weapons while playing an instrument.

Unfortunately raising thrown weapons is terribly slow, and now at 23rd
level I think it's probably too late for me to start trying to raise this
skill to an acceptable level. (well there's still always the cash route)

-TopFlite
Fendryl, HalfElven Minstrel of Tarrew Marr
